# How to Download Overcooked - The Lost Morsel Cracked PC for Free
 
Overcooked - The Lost Morsel is a DLC pack for the popular co-op cooking game Overcooked, developed by Ghost Town Games and published by Team17. It adds six new campaign levels, six new chefs, a new world map, and a new helicopter vehicle to the base game. The DLC pack was released on November 15, 2016 for Windows, Xbox One, PlayStation 4, and Nintendo Switch.
 
If you are looking for a way to download Overcooked - The Lost Morsel cracked PC for free, you have come to the right place. In this article, we will show you how to get the DLC pack without paying anything. However, we do not condone piracy and we recommend that you support the developers by buying the game and the DLC pack from official sources.

The final step is to install Overcooked - The Lost Morsel cracked PC on your computer. To do this, you need to copy and paste all the files from the Overcooked - The Lost Morsel folder into the Overcooked folder. This will overwrite some of the existing files and add new ones. Make sure you replace all the files when prompted.
